com.paytm.challenge

Class SimpleMovingAverage<E extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paytm.challenge.SimpleMovingAverage<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of element stored in the list. Element must be of type Number
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovingAverage<E>

    public class SimpleMovingAverage<E extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MovingAverage<E>
    Implementation of MovingAverage Interface. SimpleMovingAverage uses LinkedList to store the data. The data is of type Number. It provides method to add element to the list and retrieve the element at a specific index.
